amendment.description: To increase discretionary health spending for fiscal year 2004 by $2,800,000,000 and make an offsetting reduction in overall administrative expenses.

vote.text: Amendment SA 401 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 1. Record Vote Number: 80.

action.text: Amendment SA 401 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Specter. (consideration: CR S4334; text: CR S4334) To increase discretionary health spending for fiscal year 2004 by $2,800,000,000 and make an offsetting reduction in overall administrative expenses.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 401 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 1. Record Vote Number: 80.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 401 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 1. Record Vote Number: 80.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 401 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Specter.
